name: Sheep Simulator: Roman Edition
description:
Join up and command a unit of Roman legionnaires against the onslaught of enemy legionaries! However,  you have to time your commands as your units have to react to your commands. This wave-based action game was created for the GMTK 2021 Gamejam.  

CONTROLS

WASD- Movement

Space Bar- Switch stances of your units(Spear Attack Mode & Shield Defense Mode)

ESC Key - Pause the game
